In May 2004, when Bush visited the Pentagon and then repaired to Donald Rumsfeld 's office, the secretary handed him yet another I-quit letter. I have concluded that the damage from the acts of abuse that happened on my watch, by individuals for whose conduct I am ultimately responsible, can best be responded to by my resignation, it said. Bush rejected the idea. Donald Rumsfeld said his mind was made up. But Bush would not accept the resignation, and Donald Rumsfeld says he eventually accepted the decision. To no one

Danny Sullivan , editor-in-chief of technology blog SearchEngineLand.com, said Google's biggest challenges now are to`` prove that they've got their Mojo back and that nobody needs to fear them.'' You have investors and others saying` Gosh, Facebook seems to be doing so well. Why aren't you the hot new thing?' Danny Sullivan said. In a conference call with financial analysts after the announcement that Page would replace Eric Schmidt , co-founder Sergey Brin indicated the company would be putting more effort into the social arena. stole jewelry, Zahi Hawass wrote in a blog post Sunday. A group of`` tourist police officers'' had stayed at the museum overnight, as they were unable to leave after the curfew took effect. These officers, and many young Egyptians who were also there, helped to stop more people from entering the museum during the protests, Zahi Hawass wrote in the blog post-- which he faxed to Italy so colleagues there could post it on his website in the absence of internet in Egypt. has introduced a bill that would cut off federal funding to Planned Parenthood and other abortion providers. The bill, the Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act, has 127 co-sponsors, including seven from California. It is morally wrong to end an unborn human life by abortion, said Mike Pence in a prepared statement.`` It is also morally wrong to take the taxpayer dollars of millions of pro-life Americans and use them to promote abortion at home or abroad.''`` Last year

Quickbase Database as a Service Is Being Exposed For Rich Application Developers For Some Surprising New Apps Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
